About Safe Harbor - Safe Harbor s Leave Site Now DONATE NOW 0 Items Search for: Home About Us About Us Our Work Board Staff Contact Us Media Kit How We Work Counseling Children’s / Youth Counseling Program Safe Houses Court Advocacy SMART Safe Bars Red Flags / How to Help a Friend Resources/Blog Blog Media Kit The Counselor’s Corner Get Involved Volunteer Internship Opportunities Community Outreach Request Third Party Fundraising Events Donate Goods Host a Drive Provide a Meal Donate Select Page About Safe Harbor About Us We work to save, transform, and rebuild lives. We provide the support that survivors of sexual and domestic violence and human trafficking need to overcome their crisis and transform their lives. We believe in supporting each client without judgment, helping them normalize their reactions and feelings related to their experiences. Our approach is client-centered and trauma-informed, acknowledging that the survivor is the expert on their own experiences and understands what choices are safest for themselves and their family. Our goal is to help clients understand and address the impact of trauma and build resilience. All services are available in English and Spanish and at no cost to the survivor regardless of race, gender, age, national origin, income, immigration status, gender identity or expression, faith, sexual orientation, disability, ethnicity, and geographic location. We are open to all. We serve all. Our services include individual counseling and support groups for adult and children/youth, emergency shelter, court advocacy, hospital accompaniment, 24-hour helpline and community outreach and education. We are committed to transforming the lives of survivors, by helping those who have been impacted by violence and abuse to heal, rebuild, and move forward with their lives. In 1998 representatives of Bon Secours, Henrico County and other key partners met to address the shortage of shelter beds and support services in Henrico County for domestic violence victims. We opened our doors in April 2000 as an emergency shelter to provide safe housing for victims of domestic violence in imminent danger. While Henrico County is our primary service area for sexual and domestic violence services, we provide services to sex and labor trafficking survivors throughout the state. Categories Categories Select Category Current Events & News International Local & Regional State & National Learn & Grow Domestic Violence How To Help… Human Trafficking Recovery & Resilience Programs Community Awareness Conferences & Trainings Counseling Groups Hotline 804.612.6126 Individual Interns Court Advocacy Fundraising Beacon of Hope Planned Giving Walk To End It Outreach Community Support Donate Goods Volunteers Shelters Shelter News Survivor Stories Resources/Blog Counselors Corner Safe Harbor News Events & Happenings Gratitude Report Press Releases Recent Media Updates & Changes Uncategorized Testimonials Great experience and gained great amount of knowledge. Since this is so prevalent in today's society it is best to have the most information possible. “I learned that I am as strong as I think I am, and that I am definitely a survivor.” - T, domestic violence survivor “Both my child and I have received counseling that has added to the quality of our life.  I know that I am not alone, and that has made me a better parent.” - I, domestic violence survivor “I feel so fortunate to have found a program like Safe Harbor. I was greeted with smiles, a calming presence, and a place to heal and rebuild my life.Thank you!” -M., domestic violence survivor “Safe Harbor helped me to get a preliminary protective order against my abuser.  Their services and support helped me to navigate the court system and feel more confident.  I am very grateful for these resources and to know that I was not alone during this process.” - M, domestic violence survivor “It was very nice to have someone there to give me support while I was going through the process.  She was very helpful and kind. I did not know that people like that existed anymore.” - Survivor quote Like Us on Facebook! SHAMc is the perfect space for parties, weddings, corporate events, kids' birthday parties, and more! Our eclectic art center offers a creative atmosphere that transforms any occasion into an unforgettable experience.​ magical magical magical magical MAKE YOUR EVENT WHY SHAMc? Unique Ambiance: Immerse your guests in a one-of-a-kind setting filled with colorful art, quirky installations, and an inspiring vibe that reflects the heart of Safety Harbor. Flexible Spaces: Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or a large celebration, our versatile indoor and outdoor spaces can be tailored to suit your needs. We accommodate everything from casual parties to formal weddings. Artistic Touch: Add a creative flair to your event with options to include art installations, live music, or interactive workshops. At SHAMc, your event is more than just a party—it's an artistic experience. Supportive Staff: Our dedicated team is here to help you every step of the way, ensuring your event runs smoothly from start to finish. BOOK YOUR EVENT TODAY Ready to create lasting memories in a space like no other? Fill out the form below to get started: WE'RE NOT ACCEPTING EVENT REQUESTS AT THIS TIME.
